references.paper_title: An optimal transportation approach for assessing almost stochastic order
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of almost stochastic dominance using optimal transport, which is extended to the multivariate case in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Sinkhorn distances: Lightspeed computation of optimal transport
references.reason: This paper introduces entropic regularization of optimal transport, a key technique used for efficient computation in the current paper.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of stochastic orders, which is the foundation for the multivariate stochastic dominance concept in the current paper.
This paper analyzes the sample complexity of Sinkhorn divergences, which is crucial for establishing the statistical properties of the proposed method.
This paper describes the functional delta method, a key tool used for proving the central limit theorem for the proposed statistic.
